value:
$WmMPID_舞踏祭オリヴィエ,ch04_03_Olivie_F_dance17,Face|Inigo! Thank goodness!$k$p$WmMPID_舞踏祭アズール,ch04_19_Azur_M_dance17,Face|There you are, Mother! I'm so glad.
Now we can fight together...alongside
this beauty!$k$p$WmMPID_舞踏祭黒アクア,ch05_07_Aqua_F_dance17,Face|...$k$p$WmMPID_舞踏祭シグレ,ch05_32_Shigure_M_dance17,Face|Mother! I've finally found you... I've
been searching for you ever since
the day you disappeared...$k$pWait... How is it that you're wearing
your pendant?$k$p$WmMPID_舞踏祭黒アクア,ch05_07_Aqua_F_dance17,Face|I am sorry. I am not the one you seek.
But I will someday share that same
fate...$k$pI may not be able to heal the rift in
your heart, but for now, at least, I can
fight by your side.$k$p$WmMPID_舞踏祭シグレ,ch05_32_Shigure_M_dance17,Face|...$k$pI understand. I'm glad that I had a
chance to meet you.$k$p$Sbs1000|

$SbpBGM_EVENT_PLAIN_02,0|$WmMPID_舞踏祭シグレ,ch05_32_Shigure_M_dance17,Face|And now the truth is out. You've been
working to free us...and protect this
place. I'm sorry we doubted you.$k$p$WmMPID_舞踏祭黒アクア,ch05_07_Aqua_F_dance17,Face|I thank you for your aid. If I may, I'd
like to repay you with a song.
Shigure?$k$p$WmMPID_舞踏祭シグレ,ch05_32_Shigure_M_dance17,Face|I'd be glad to join you!$k$p$WmMPID_舞踏祭オリヴィエ,ch04_03_Olivie_F_dance17,Face|Don't forget us! Ready, Inigo?$k$p$WmMPID_舞踏祭アズール,ch04_19_Azur_M_dance17,Face|Yes, Mother! If we can bring smiles to
their faces with song and dance...$k$pWell, then... It'll go some small way
toward repaying their kindness to us!$k$pOne day, I hope we can all gather
together and smile like this again!$k$p$Sbs150|
